diff_hunk:
@@ -34,6 +34,15 @@ if [[ "$BUILD_ENVIRONMENT" == *asan* ]]; then
     (cd test && ! python -c "import torch; torch._C._crash_if_aten_asan(3)")
 fi
 
+export ATEN_DISABLE_AVX=0
body: These shouldn't be set at all. Our dispatch code only [checks whether the environment variables has been set at all](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/cpu/CapabilityDispatch.h#L49), this is similar to USE_MKLDNN etc. I'll also send out a PR soon that switches this from ATEN_DISABLE_AVX to USE_AVX etc., but for now we should just get this landed so we can be sure it's tested.
body_html: These shouldn't be set at all. Our dispatch code only checks whether the environment variables has been set at all, this is similar to USE_MKLDNN etc. I'll also send out a PR soon that switches this from ATEN_DISABLE_AVX to USE_AVX etc., but for now we should just get this landed so we can be sure it's tested.

Our dispatch code only checks whether the environment variables has been set at all, this is similar to USE_MKLDNN etc. I'll also send out a PR soon that switches this from ATEN_DISABLE_AVX to USE_AVX etc., but for now we should just get this landed so we can be sure it's tested.
